alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Hays; Travis (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 25 at 11:10PM CST by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Caldwell, southeastern Hays and southeastern Travis Counties through 1145 PM CST... At 1110 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kyle, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Austin, San Marcos, Kyle, Buda, Tanglewood Forest, Austin Bergstrom Int Airport, Bee Cave, West Lake Hills, Hudson Bend, Rollingwood, Martindale, Uhland, Mustang Ridge, Niederwald, Bear Creek, Barton Creek, Shady Hollow, Onion Creek, Mansfield Dam and Hornsby Bend. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
